body.p: Andreas Veithen was born in 1977 in Sankt Vith (eastern part of Belgium).
After getting his BSc and MSc in theoretical physics, he was a research fellow at the Catholic University of Louvain.
In 2002 he started to work for it-optics, a small company focusing on Open Source services.
Since 2005 he is a developer at GFI Benelux, where he mainly works on Java projects.
